creator: llwang@novell.com
text:
I am using SuSE Linux Enterprise Server 11
I checked out the latest code
# svn checkout http://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/httpd/test/framework/trunk/ httpd-framework

Then I followed the "quick start" in README
# perl Makefile.PL -apxs /usr/sbin/apxs2
# t/TEST

But I got following error:
[warning] setting ulimit to allow core files
ulimit -c unlimited; /usr/bin/perl /home/leon/project/httpd-framework/t/TEST 
/usr/sbin/httpd2-prefork  -d /home/leon/project/httpd-framework/t -f /home/leon/project/httpd-framework/t/conf/httpd.conf -D APACHE2 -D PERL_USEITHREADS
using Apache/2.2.13 (prefork MPM)

waiting 60 seconds for server to start: .Syntax error on line 170 of /home/leon/project/httpd-framework/t/conf/httpd.conf:
Invalid command '<IfVersion', perhaps misspelled or defined by a module not included in the server configuration
[  error] 
server has died with status 255 (t/logs/error_log wasn't created, start the server in the debug mode)

Any Clue?

creator: trawick@apache.org
text:
Include mod_version in your httpd configuration.

Please discuss issues using the httpd test suite on the dev@httpd.apache.org mailing list.

Yes, when I added following 3 lines into /home/leon/project/httpd-framework/t/conf/httpd.conf, the test can work.

<IfModule !mod_version.c>
    LoadModule version_module "/usr/lib/apache2-prefork/mod_version.so"
</IfModule>

But there still a lot of mod missed. So lots of test skipped or failed.


httpd-framework/t/conf/httpd.conf is an auto generated conf, so what am I missing during cofinguring? any parameter needs during "perl Makefile.PL -apxs /usr/sbin/apxs2"?
creator: llwang@novell.com
trawick@apache.org
text:
>so what am I
missing during cofinguring? any parameter needs during "perl Makefile.PL -apxs
/usr/sbin/apxs2"?

Hi Lean, Bugzilla is not an appropriate support forum for the test suite.  (Meanwhile, I see you posted to dev@httpd, which is the right venue.)
